name: 18V Cordless Impact Driver
description: Battery-powered driver for roofing screws and metal strap anchors.

name: Circular Power Saw - Medium Size
description: Medium size circular power saw for cutting tree branches, limbs, and logs. Essential for clearing fallen trees in pastures and agricultural areas.

name: 20 in Chainsaw Chain
description: Replacement chain sized for 20-inch bar saws so operators can keep cutting while dull chains are sharpened.
